SEARCH
Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.domain.repositories

Interface CategoryRepositoryInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryCategoryRepository
public interface CategoryRepositoryInterface
Interface defining the operations for managing categories within the application. This includes operations for creating, finding, adding, and deleting categories.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Category
    addCategory(Category category)
    Adds a new category to the repository.
    Category
    createCategory(String name)
    Creates a new category with the specified name.
    void
    deleteCategoryByName(String name)
    Deletes a category from the repository based on its name.
    Iterable<Category>
    findAll()
    Retrieves all categories in the repository.
    Optional<Category>
    findCategoryByName(String name)
    Finds a category by its name.

  • Method Details

    • addCategory

      Category addCategory(Category category)
      Adds a new category to the repository.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to add.
      Returns:
      The added category.

    • findCategoryByName

      Optional<Category> findCategoryByName(String name)
      Finds a category by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found category, or an empty Optional if no category is found.

    • deleteCategoryByName

      void deleteCategoryByName(String name)
      Deletes a category from the repository based on its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category to be deleted.

    • findAll

      Iterable<Category> findAll()
      Retrieves all categories in the repository.
      Returns:
      An Iterable collection of all categories.

    • createCategory

      Category createCategory(String name) throws InvalidCategoryException
      Creates a new category with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new category.
      Returns:
      The newly created category.
      Throws:
      InvalidCategoryException - If the category creation fails due to invalid data.
